response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To support the development of training materials and technical manuals:

1. Gather relevant information and specifications
2. Organize content logically and sequentially
3. Use clear, concise language and terminology
4. Incorporate visual aids like diagrams and flowcharts
5. Include step-by-step instructions and procedures
6. Develop a consistent format and style guide
7. Review and revise for accuracy and clarity
8. Seek feedback from subject matter experts and end-users
9. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations
10. Update materials regularly to reflect changes and improvements
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
